UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile on the TeamUp Forge platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile photo.

roles.description: List of roles assigned to the user.

skills.description: List of skills possessed by the user.

badges.description: List of badges earned by the user.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user profile was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the user profile was last updated.

Match.title: Match
Match.description: Represents a match between two users.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Match entity.

matchScore.description: The score representing the quality of the match between the two users.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the match was calculated.

ChatRoom.title: ChatRoom
ChatRoom.description: Represents a chat room between two or more users.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ChatRoom entity.

userProfileIds.description: References to UserProfiles in the chat room. (Relationship: UserProfile N:N ChatRoom)

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the chat room was created.

ChatMessage.title: ChatMessage
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message within a chat room.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ChatMessage entity.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the message was sent.

definition.description: Stores user profile data. Path-based ownership, enabling simple security rules based on `request.auth.uid == userId`.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

definition.description: Stores match data for each user. Matches are owned by the parent user.  Path-based ownership, enabling simple security rules based on `request.auth.uid == userId`.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

params.name: matchId
params.description: The unique identifier of the match.

definition.description: Stores chat room data. Includes denormalized `members` map (userId: true) for authorization independence.  Allows listing of chat rooms a user is a member of.

params.name: chatRoomId
params.description: The unique identifier of the chat room.

definition.description: Stores chat messages within a chat room.  Authorization is inherited from the parent chatRoom document. Assumes only members of the chatRoom can read/write messages.

params.name: chatRoomId
params.description: The unique identifier of the chat room.

params.name: messageId
params.description: The unique identifier of the message.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to ensure Authorization Independence, DBAC, and support secure list operations (QAPs). User profiles are stored under `/users/{userId}` for private data with path-based ownership. Matches are stored under `/users/{userId}/matches/{matchId}` since a user has many matches, inheriting the ownership from the user. This eliminates the need for `get()` calls in security rules. ChatRooms between users are placed in a top-level `/chatRooms/{chatRoomId}` collection, with denormalized `members` map to grant access to users, this enforces authorization independence and avoids complex rule logic. ChatMessages are nested under `/chatRooms/{chatRoomId}/messages/{messageId}`, inheriting authorization from the parent ChatRoom. This design prioritizes clarity, scalability, and robust security.
